property.name: colorModel
property.shortdesc: The color model for the rasterization.

property.name: transparency
property.shortdesc: Should the resulting image use transparency.

property.name: antiAliasing
property.shortdesc: Should the resulting image be antialiased.

property.name: clippingMask
property.shortdesc: Should a clipping mask be created for the resulting image.

property.name: convertSpotColors
property.shortdesc: Whether to convert all spot colors to process colors in the resulting image.

property.name: padding
property.shortdesc: The amount of white space (in points) to be added around the object during rasterization.
